creator: PTI
title: Forbes ranks HDFC 5th biggest consumer financial services company worldwide
dc:creator: PTI
content: Housing finance major HDFC has been ranked as the 5th biggest public company globally in the 'consumer financial services category' on a list compiled by Forbes magazine.
contentSnippet: Housing finance major HDFC has been ranked as the 5th biggest public company globally in the 'consumer financial services category' on a list compiled by Forbes magazine.
